title: UK to cap ground rents paid to freeholders
description: Limit will be set at £250 a year after Sir Keir Starmer overrules Rachel Reeves to push through manifesto promise
content: Limit will be set at £250 a year after Sir Keir Starmer overrules Rachel Reeves to push through manifesto promise
